title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 358, subpt. 358-4 - Rights And Obligations Of Social Services Agencies
content:

State Regulations
§ 358-4.0 - Introduction
§ 358-4.1 - Proposed actions
§ 358-4.2 - Prehearing responsibilities
§ 358-4.3 - Responsibilities and rights in the fair hearing process
§ 358-4.4 - Compliance with fair hearing decision

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 358, subpt. 358-4

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 22[3][f], 22[8], 34[3][f], 337, 390[12], 424-a, 455, 460-d

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
